sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.WidgetNavTables</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Returns list of tables allowed to be used in widget navigation records</description>
        <name>WidgetNavTables</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var WidgetNavTables = Class.create();
WidgetNavTables.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
    
    process: function() {
        var result = [];
        var dict = new GlideRecord("sys_dictionary");
        dict.addNullQuery("element");
        var gc = dict.addQuery("name", "pa_widgets");
        gc.addOrCondition("name", "sys_report");
        dict.orderBy("name");
        dict.query();
        
        while (dict.next()) {
        	result.push("" + dict.name);
        }
       
        return result;
    }
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2017-05-29 14:42:59</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>23f1fd9953033200ae8dc12b44dc34bc</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>WidgetNavTables</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Reporting" source="com.glideapp.report">4433b8603c31311068bcf327dfe37f37</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_23f1fd9953033200ae8dc12b44dc34bc</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2017-05-29 14:44:42</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
